short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically links israeli laws references to the Knesset website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an auto-linker for laws officials sources for Hebrew written web pages.
By one click you will get an immediate access to read about the original law and it''s full detail, that's one big chance to rich the knowledge!
The extenssion will be at the backgroung, when you will route to a page which include some references of Israeli laws names, a link will appear and also a small popup above, which present the law's future Uri.
